ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 111 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 111 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Increivel! Adorei e creo que vocs tambm vai adorar!
Definitely take this class if you want to learn Portuguese. Not super difficult, and yet you feel like you learn a lot over the semester.
A thorough, beginning Portuguese course. Yes, I would recommend it to anyone wanting to learn beginning Portuguese.

I would recommend this course to a student already familiar with another Romance language. Without a basic understanding of Spanish, I would not have succeeded in this course. Even with 12 years of Spanish, it moved pretty quickly, so if you don't have a basic understanding, you will have to compensate a lot throughout this course. Other than that, this is an interesting language that is less of a workload as other Yale languages. I think immersion is the best way to learn a language.
